Kd Two curves Demo:
A*B-Kd1*AB=0
A0-A-AB=0
B0-AB-B=0
#
A0 : Aptamer conc. / nM
B0 :  Targent concentration /nm
Kd1 : binding Kd /nM
AB/B0 : percent binding
RIC50 Coop:
2*V*A-Kd1*VA=0
VA * A - 2*Kd2*VAA =0
R*V-Kr1*RV=0
R*VA-Kr2*RVA=0
R*VAA-Kr3*RVAA=0
A+VA+2*VAA+RVA+2*RVAA-A0=0
V + VA + VAA + RV + RVA + RVAA - V0=0
R + RV + RVA + RVAA -R0=0
#
V0:Starting VEGF conc.
R0:Starting Receptor Con.
A0:Starting Aptamer Conc.
Kd1: VEGF Aptamer First binding Kd1
Kd2: VEGF Aptamer Second binding Kd
Kr1 : Receptor VEGF binding Kd
Kr2 : Receptor VEGF-Aptamer Complex Kd
Kr3: Receptor V-A-A complex Kd
V, A, VA, VAA, R, RV, RVA, RVAA
RIC50 Coop VA on R:
2*V*A-Kd1*VA=0
VA * A - 2*Kd2*VAA =0
R*V-Kr1*RV=0
R*VA-Kr2*RVA=0
R*VAA-Kr3*RVAA=0
A+VA+2*VAA+RVA+2*RVAA-A0=0
V + VA + VAA + RV + RVA + RVAA - V0=0
R + RV + RVA + RVAA -R0=0
#
V0:Starting VEGF conc.
R0:Starting Receptor Con.
A0:Starting Aptamer Conc.
Kd1: VEGF Aptamer First binding Kd1
Kd2: VEGF Aptamer Second binding Kd
Kr1 : Receptor VEGF binding Kd
Kr2 : Receptor VEGF-Aptamer Complex Kd
Kr3: Receptor V-A-A complex Kd
V, A, VA, VAA, R, RV, RVA, RVAA
Kd variable by Hill:
A*B-Kd*AB=0
A0-A-AB=0
B0-AB-B=0
Kd-A0*((Kd0/A0)**Hill)=0

#
A0 : Aptamer conc. / nM
B0 :  Targent concentration /nm
Kd1 : binding Kd /nM
AB/B0 : percent binding
RIC50 with Hill:
A*V-Kda*AV=0
R*V-Kdr*RV=0
A+AV-A0=0
V+AV-V0=0
R+RV-R0=0
Kda-A0*((Kd0/A0)**Hill)=0
#
A0:Aptamer Conc.
V0:VEGF Conc.
R0: Receptor Conc.
Kd0: Aptamer Kd
Hill:Hill coefficient for aptamer
Kdr: Receptor Kd
